message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you the opportunity to purchase our premium product. Given its high value and the fact that it is worth $15,000 to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My initial offer for the product is $14,000. I look forward to your response.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am unable to accept $12,000 for the product. I believe its true value warrants a higher price. My counteroffer for the product is $13,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
